title: Cap Streamers, 1701–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Binche ground
creditline: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Pair of Binche-style cap streamers densely patterned with floral motifs, fronds, and urns of flowers.
